document_data.name: Murssvayas Dhuurniv
document_data.mainbody: '''Murssvayas Dhuurniv''' was a [[drow]] [[wizard]] and a former member of [[House Dhuurniv]] in [[Szith Morcane]].
document_data.Description: Atypical for a [[drow]], Murssvayas' skin kept his silver hair close-cropped and sported long, well-maintained sideburns. His skin was especially dark with purplish tone and his eyes were a striking green. The drow wore adventurer's garb with numerous fetishes and pouches rather than typical mage robes.{{Cite adventurers league/Boltsmelter's Book|17}}
document_data.Personality: Murssvayas was a smart but desperate individual. He was also very pragmatic and cautious about surfacers. In his heart, however, Murssvayas was truly evil and thought that goodness and lawfulness were weaknesses that he could use for his own goals. Despite this, he knew when to keep this thoughts to himself.
document_data.Possessions: Murssvayas wielded a [[dagger]] and carried a staff.{{Cite adventurers league/Boltsmelter's Book|28}}
